settings.banner_heading_1: The perfect variety sampler for every tea lover’s journey
settings.banner_superscript_two: Not sure where to start? Rishi's Premium Sachet Collection sampler is a great place to begin your Tea Journey. Try our most popular teas—all organic, direct trade, and made from the finest possible ingredients.

custom_css: .metafield-rich_text_field p.content_hide,.metafield-rich_text_field p {transition: none; overflow: auto; max-height: none; padding: inherit !important;}

settings.heading: Food & Wine
settings.content: Make just about any beverage with this versatile, high-quality matcha powder and you’ll understand why it's so popular.

settings.heading: Serious Eats
settings.content: Fantastic, especially in lattes, and hands-down the most approachable matcha for beginners.

settings.heading: Camille Styles
settings.content: Its invigoratingly smooth flavor and bright green hue pair perfectly with your milk of choice

settings.title: CERTIFIED ORGANIC
settings.quote: Organic teas are healthier for the planet and people who grow, craft and enjoy steeping them. That's why over 95% of Rishi's ingredients are certified organic.

settings.title: DIRECT TRADE
settings.quote: Ethically sourced directly from artisan tea and botanical farmers around the world. Our deep relationships are the foundation of the authentic tea experiences you can expect from Rishi.

settings.title: BEAUTIFUL INGREDIENTS
settings.quote: Rishi teas are inspired by equal parts: ancient herbal medicinal traditions and modern culinary innovation. Discover new teas and botanicals in exciting, fresh and artfully crafted blends

settings.header: Founded on the commitment to set the standard for quality
settings.description: We offer premium tea and botanicals imported directly from growers across the world and draw inspiration from ancient artisanal practices that use organic cultivation techniques
